snippet: Jamie Dimon has throat cancer. | Puerto Rico’s power utility is struggling to pay its debts. | A single bidder won a Bitcoin auction by the U.S. Marshals Service. | Pershing Square has hired Credit Suisse as an adviser in its fight with Allergan.
abstract: Jamie Dimon has throat cancer. | Puerto Rico’s power utility is struggling to pay its debts. | A single bidder won a Bitcoin auction by the U.S. Marshals Service. | Pershing Square has hired Credit Suisse as an adviser in its fight with Allergan.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: JPMorgan Chief Has 'Curable' Cancer
